In the fifth Nb site, Nb(5) is bonded to one N(3), one N(5), and four equivalent N(2) atoms to form NbN6 octahedra that share corners with three equivalent Nb(4)N6 octahedra, corners with three equivalent Nb(3)N5 square pyramids,  an edgeedge with one Nb(4)N6 octahedra, edges with two equivalent Nb(5)N6 octahedra, edges with four equivalent Nb(1)N6 octahedra,  an edgeedge with one Nb(3)N5 square pyramid, and edges with four equivalent Nb(2)N5 square pyramids.
